Bash(# Create a simple compose test to see output format
mkdir -p /tmp/compose-test-debug
cd /tmp/compose-test-debug

# Create a minimal compose override
cat > docker-compose.override.yml << ''EOF''
version: ''3.8''
services:
  vortex:
    container_name: vortex-debug-test
    environment:
      VORTEX_RUN_ON_STARTUP: false
      VORTEX_SCHEDULE: ""# DISABLED""
EOF

# Test compose up output
cd /home/rosantos/workspace/projects/vortex/main
compose_output=$(docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f /tmp/compose-test-debug/docker-compose.override.yml -p vortex-debug up -d 2>&1)

echo ""=== Docker Compose Output ===""
echo ""$compose_output""
echo ""=== End Output ===""

# Clean up immediately
docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f /tmp/compose-test-debug/docker-compose.override.yml -p vortex-debug down --remove-orphans >/dev/null 2>&1
rm -rf /tmp/compose-test-debug)

Bash(# Create a test similar to what Test 14 does to debug the compose startup
mkdir -p /tmp/debug-compose-test
cd /tmp/debug-compose-test

# Create the same override file that Test 14 uses
cat > docker-compose.override.yml << ''EOF''
version: ''3.8''
services:
  vortex:
    container_name: vortex-debug-test
    environment:
      VORTEX_DEFAULT_PROVIDER: yahoo
      VORTEX_RUN_ON_STARTUP: true
      VORTEX_DOWNLOAD_ARGS: ""--yes --symbol AAPL --symbol MSFT --start-date 2024-12-01 --end-date 2024-12-07""
      VORTEX_SCHEDULE: ""# DISABLED""
      VORTEX_LOG_LEVEL: DEBUG
    volumes:
      - $PWD/test-data:/data
      - $PWD/test-config:/home/vortex/.config/vortex
EOF

mkdir -p test-data test-config
chmod 777 test-data test-config

cd /home/rosantos/workspace/projects/vortex/main

echo ""=== Testing Docker Compose Startup ===""
compose_output=$(docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f /tmp/debug-compose-test/docker-compose.override.yml -p debug-test up -d 2>&1)
exit_code=$?

echo ""Exit code: $exit_code""
echo ""Output:""
echo ""$compose_output""

# Clean up
docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml -f /tmp/debug-compose-test/docker-compose.override.yml -p debug-test down --remove-orphans >/dev/null 2>&1 || true
rm -rf /tmp/debug-compose-test)

Bash(# Debug the directory creation issue by recreating the test scenario manually
cd /home/rosantos/workspace/projects/vortex/main

# Simulate what the test does
TEST_SESSION_DIR=""test-output/session-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)""
mkdir -p ""$TEST_SESSION_DIR""

timestamp=$(date +%s)
test_data_dir=""${TEST_SESSION_DIR}/test-data-compose-${timestamp}""
test_config_dir=""${TEST_SESSION_DIR}/test-config-compose-${timestamp}""

echo ""Creating directories:""
echo ""  test_data_dir: $test_data_dir""
echo ""  test_config_dir: $test_config_dir""

mkdir -p ""$test_data_dir"" ""$test_config_dir""

echo ""Directories created successfully:""
ls -la ""$TEST_SESSION_DIR""

# Try to create the override file
compose_override_file=""$test_data_dir/docker-compose.override.yml""
echo ""Creating override file at: $compose_override_file""

cat > ""$compose_override_file"" << EOF
version: ''3.8''
services:
  vortex:
    container_name: vortex-debug-manual
    environment:
      VORTEX_DEFAULT_PROVIDER: yahoo
      VORTEX_RUN_ON_STARTUP: true
      VORTEX_DOWNLOAD_ARGS: ""--yes --symbol AAPL --symbol MSFT --start-date 2024-12-01 --end-date 2024-12-07""
      VORTEX_SCHEDULE: ""# DISABLED""
      VORTEX_LOG_LEVEL: DEBUG
    volumes:
      - $PWD/$test_data_dir:/data
      - $PWD/$test_config_dir:/home/vortex/.config/vortex
EOF

echo ""Override file created:""
ls -la ""$compose_override_file""
echo ""Content:""
cat ""$compose_override_file""

# Clean up
rm -rf ""$TEST_SESSION_DIR"")

Bash(# Test the create_test_directories function manually
cd /home/rosantos/workspace/projects/vortex/main

# Simulate exactly what the test does
source scripts/test-docker-build.sh

# Declare the variables
test_data_dir=""""
test_config_dir=""""

# Call the function exactly as the test does
create_test_directories ""test_data_dir"" ""test_config_dir"" ""compose""

echo ""After create_test_directories:""
echo ""test_data_dir = ''$test_data_dir''""
echo ""test_config_dir = ''$test_config_dir''""

# Check if directories exist
if [[ -d ""$test_data_dir"" ]]; then
    echo ""test_data_dir exists: YES""
    ls -la ""$test_data_dir""
else
    echo ""test_data_dir exists: NO""
fi

# Try to create a test file
test_file=""$test_data_dir/test.yml""
if echo ""test content"" > ""$test_file"" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo ""File creation: SUCCESS""
    echo ""File exists: $(test -f ""$test_file"" && echo YES || echo NO)""
else
    echo ""File creation: FAILED""
    echo ""Error details:""
    ls -la ""$(dirname ""$test_data_dir"")"" 2>/dev/null || echo ""Parent directory doesn''t exist""
fi

# Clean up
rm -rf ""$test_data_dir"" ""$test_config_dir"" 2>/dev/null || true)

Bash(# Let me create a minimal test to debug the argument parsing
cd /home/rosantos/workspace/projects/vortex/main

# Create a simple test script to debug argument parsing
cat > /tmp/debug_args.sh << ''EOF''
#!/bin/bash
SPECIFIC_TESTS=()
COMPREHENSIVE=false
VERBOSE=false

while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
    case $1 in
        -v|--verbose)
            VERBOSE=true
            shift
            ;;
        --comprehensive)
            COMPREHENSIVE=true
            shift
            ;;
        *)
            # Assume it''s a test number
            if [[ ""$1"" =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]]; then
                SPECIFIC_TESTS+=(""$1"")
                echo ""Added test number: $1""
            else
                echo ""Error: Invalid test number ''$1''"" >&2
                exit 1
            fi
            shift
            ;;
    esac
done

echo ""Final SPECIFIC_TESTS: ${SPECIFIC_TESTS[*]}""
echo ""COMPREHENSIVE: $COMPREHENSIVE""
echo ""VERBOSE: $VERBOSE""
EOF

chmod +x /tmp/debug_args.sh

echo ""=== Test 1: 14 --comprehensive -v ===""
/tmp/debug_args.sh 14 --comprehensive -v

echo """"
echo ""=== Test 2: -v --comprehensive 14 ===""
/tmp/debug_args.sh -v --comprehensive 14)
